powershell_exec.description: Run a command under PowerShell directly via .NET and return the stdout parsed to JSON for easier parsing.

powershell_exec!.description: The same as the #powershell_exec method except this will raise Chef::PowerShell::CommandFailed if the command fails.

powershell_out.description:
Run a command under powershell with the same API as shell_out. Theoptions hash is extended to take an "architecture" flag which
can be set to :i386 or :x86_64 to force the windows architecture.

powershell_out!.description: Run a command under powershell with the same API as shell_out! except this will raise Chef::PowerShell::CommandFailed if the command fails.

shell_out.description: Run a command on Linux / Unix / macOS systems and return the stdout/stderr.

shell_out!.description: The same as the #shell_out method except this will raise Chef::PowerShell::CommandFailed if the command fails.
